participant_1.background:
I like to take my time getting ready in the morning, then grab a quick coffee and head out on my daily drive.
I do laundry once a week to keep my home clean and tidy.
i am a nurse and work in an emergency room at a busy hospital.
i like going barefoot.
sometimes , people worry i am crazy.

participant_2.background:
I went to Comic Con this weekend and had a blast!
i am a 1st grade teacher.
i like to build things.
I love taking care of my curls.
i love tuna.

content.text: How are you doing this morning?
I am doing well, thank you for asking!
I am glad to hear that. I had a busy weekend.
I went to Comic Con this weekend and had a blast!
That sounds like a lot of fun! I have never been to Comic Con.
It was a lot of fun, but also very crowded.
I can imagine. What was the best part of Comic Con?
I think the best part was meeting all of the different people who are interested in the same things I am.
That sounds like a great experience. I am glad you had a good time.
Thank you!
What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to build things, take care of my curls, and read.
I like to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read all different types of books, but I especially like historical fiction.
I have not read much historical fiction. What is your favorite historical fiction book?
My favorite historical fiction book is The Book Thief by Markus Zusak.
I have heard good things about that book. I will have to check it out.
You should, it is a great book.
Thank you for the recommendation.
You are welcome
